Posts.Content: I haven't had spots (yet), but only had my first Docetaxel on Friday.Â  First day with steriods and I feel like I have been hit by a bus! I have extreme muscle ache today, which I was expecting in my legs and arms, but it considerably worse along my mastectomy scar - has anyone else had that?
Posts.Title: Docetaxel Face Rash

Posts.Content: Sorry, meant to say first day WITHOUT steriods
